pullrequest.title: Monitor SRC ihmc controller and harness status

content.raw:
Hm, that's a good point. As it is right now, you should extend with everything before posting. 

Please ignore this thread. I was also thinking that if we put that data inside the round , then  it won't be easy to find which round status to display as the Simulator Status in the constellation UI.
content.html:
Hm, that's a good point. As it is right now, you should extend with everything before posting.

Please ignore this thread. I was also thinking that if we put that data inside the round , then it won't be easy to find which round status to display as the Simulator Status in the constellation UI.
